io.foxtrot.android.sdk

Class FoxtrotSDK

  • Object
    • io.foxtrot.android.sdk.FoxtrotSDK

  • public class FoxtrotSDK
extends Object
    This is the entry point for the FoxtrotSDK. 

    
 FoxtrotSDK.setup(context, "THE-API-KEY");
 FoxtrotSDK.getInstance().registerLoginCallback(loginCallback);
 FoxtrotSDK.getInstance().login(driver);
    See Also:
    LoginCallback, RouteStateListener, ErrorStateListener

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public static void setup(android.content.Context context,
                         String apiKey)
        Setup the FoxtrotSDK with the application context and apiKey
        Parameters:
        context - the application context
        apiKey - the api key

      • getInstance

        public static FoxtrotSDK getInstance()
        Access the FoxtrotSDK after it has been setup.
        See Also:
        setup(Context, String)

      • login

        public void login(Driver driver)
        Log in the driver to Foxtrot. This method should be called after registerLoginCallback(LoginCallback)
        Parameters:
        driver - the driver to be logged in.
        See Also:
        registerLoginCallback(LoginCallback)

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Log out the current driver.

      • registerLoginCallback

        public void registerLoginCallback(LoginCallback loginCallback)
        Register the LoginCallback. This method should be called before login(Driver)
        Parameters:
        loginCallback - the login callback

      • unregisterLoginCallback

        public void unregisterLoginCallback(LoginCallback loginCallback)
        Unregister the LoginCallback.
        Parameters:
        loginCallback - the login callback

      • addRoute

        public void addRoute(Route route)
        Import a route to Foxtrot. This method should be called after registerRouteStateListener(RouteStateListener). The optimized route will be returned through the RouteStateListener.onRouteChanged(OptimizedRoute) callback.
        Parameters:
        route - the route
        See Also:
        registerRouteStateListener(RouteStateListener)

      • finishRoute

        public void finishRoute(String routeId)
        Finish a route. If there are more routes to be completed, the new route will be returned through the RouteStateListener.onRouteChanged(OptimizedRoute) callback. If there are no more routes, then RouteStateListener.onAllRoutesFinished() will be invoked.
        Parameters:
        routeId - the route id

      • addDeliveryAttempt

        public void addDeliveryAttempt(String deliveryId,
                               DeliveryAttempt attempt)
        Add a DeliveryAttempt to an OptimizedDelivery. Once the DeliveryAttempt has been added, you will be informed of the changes to the route through the RouteStateListener.onRouteChanged(OptimizedRoute) callback.
        Parameters:
        deliveryId - the delivery id
        attempt - the attempt

      • addDeliveryAttempts

        public void addDeliveryAttempts(Map<String,DeliveryAttempt> attempts)
        Convenient method to batch process multiple DeliveryAttempt. Once the DeliveryAttempt has been added, you will be informed of the changes to the route through the RouteStateListener.onRouteChanged(OptimizedRoute) callback.
        Parameters:
        attempts - mapping from a delivery id to the attempt

      • undoDeliveryAttempts

        public void undoDeliveryAttempts(String deliveryId)
        Undo the previous DeliveryAttempt that was made to an OptimizedDelivery. Once the DeliveryAttempt has been undone, you will be informed of the changes to the route through the RouteStateListener.onRouteChanged(OptimizedRoute) callback.
        Parameters:
        deliveryId - the delivery id

      • undoDeliveryAttempts

        public void undoDeliveryAttempts(List<String> deliveryIds)
        Convenient method to batch process multiple undos. Once the DeliveryAttempt has been undone, you will be informed of the changes to the route through the RouteStateListener.onRouteChanged(OptimizedRoute) callback.
        Parameters:
        deliveryIds - a list of the delivery ids

      • registerRouteStateListener

        public void registerRouteStateListener(RouteStateListener routeStateListener)
        Register the RouteStateListener
        Parameters:
        routeStateListener - the route state listener

      • unregisterRouteStateListener

        public void unregisterRouteStateListener(RouteStateListener routeStateListener)
        Unregister the RouteStateListener
        Parameters:
        routeStateListener - the route state listener

      • registerErrorStateListener

        public void registerErrorStateListener(ErrorStateListener errorStateListener)
        Register the ErrorStateListener
        Parameters:
        errorStateListener - the error state listener

      • unregisterErrorStateListener

        public void unregisterErrorStateListener(ErrorStateListener errorStateListener)
        Unregister the ErrorStateListener
        Parameters:
        errorStateListener - the error state listener
